context.description: Use this wizard to attach policies to policy subjects that use WS-Policy Attachment. To attach a policy to a policy subject, select one or more of the available entities (WSDL endpoint, message, service, or operation) in the Policy Subjects column. The Domain Expressions column displays the known endpoint URLs that are available for endpoint reference attachments. Edit these endpoints if necessary. The Domain Expressions column also displays the WSDL 1.1 Element Identifiers that are associated with the policy subject entity for IRI policy expressions.
Select this option if you want the tools to overwrite an existing policy attachment file in the project (polictyAttachments_server.XML or polictyAttachment_client.xml).
Choose one of the commonly used WS-Security policy templates to attach to the policy subjects.
